alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:14PM MDT until June 20 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER...SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN WESTON COUNTIES... At 1014 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Buckhorn to 2 miles northeast of Redbank Spring Campground to 2 miles northeast of Elk Mountain Lookout, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Deerfield, Flag Mountain, Deerfield Reservoir, Crooks Tower, Jewel Cave National Monument, Black Fox Campground, Bear Mountain Lookout and Rochford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
